subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: A billionaire, James L. Balsillie, has offered $242.5 million for the Phoenix Coyotes while the league has bid $140 million. Balsillie would move the team.
snippet: A billionaire, James L. Balsillie, has offered $242.5 million for the Phoenix Coyotes while the league has bid $140 million. Balsillie would move the team.
